commands.description: List directory contents with detailed information about files and directories.
commands.usecase: View all files including hidden ones with human-readable sizes
commands.author: Richard Stallman

commands.description: Copy files and directories from one location to another.
commands.usecase: Recursively copy entire directory structures with all contents
commands.author: Torbj√∂rn Granlund, David MacKenzie

commands.description: Move or rename files and directories.
commands.usecase: Rename files or move them to different directories
commands.author: Mike Parker, David MacKenzie

commands.description: Remove files or directories from the filesystem.
commands.usecase: Forcefully remove directories and all their contents
commands.author: Paul Rubin, David MacKenzie

commands.description: Search for files in a directory hierarchy based on various criteria.
commands.usecase: Find all log files older than 30 days in home directory
commands.author: Eric B. Decker, James Youngman

commands.description: Create new directories with specified permissions.
commands.usecase: Create nested directory structure in one command
commands.author: David MacKenzie

commands.description: Create empty files or update file timestamps.
commands.usecase: Create a new empty file or update modification time
commands.author: Paul Rubin, Arnold Robbins
